system:
note description: "Objects that store a list of unique keyboard accelerators." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." keywords: "accelerator, shortcut" date: "$Date: 2013-11-19 17:00:03 -0800 (Tue, 19 Nov 2013) $" revision: "$Revision: 93461 $"
class ../interface/ev_accelerator_list.xmlEV_ACCELERATOR_LIST
inherit ../interface/ev_active_list.xmlEV_ACTIVE_LIST [../interface/ev_accelerator.xmlEV_ACCELERATOR] undefine ../interface/ev_accelerator_list.xml#f_default_createdefault_create end
create ../interface/ev_accelerator_list.xml#f_default_createdefault_create
create {../interface/ev_accelerator_list.xmlEV_ACCELERATOR_LIST} ../interface/ev_active_list.xml#f_make_filledmake_filled
feature -- Initialization
f_default_create../interface/ev_accelerator_list.xml#f_default_createdefault_create -- Standard creation procedure. do ../interface/ev_active_list.xml#f_default_createPrecursor {../interface/ev_active_list.xmlEV_ACTIVE_LIST} ../interface/ev_active_list.xml#f_internal_add_actionsinternal_add_actions.Falseextend (agent ../interface/ev_accelerator_list.xml#f_enable_item_parentedenable_item_parented (?)) ../interface/ev_active_list.xml#f_internal_remove_actionsinternal_remove_actions.Falseextend (agent ../interface/ev_accelerator_list.xml#f_disable_item_parenteddisable_item_parented (?)) end
feature {NONE} -- Status Setting
f_enable_item_parented../interface/ev_accelerator_list.xml#f_enable_item_parentedenable_item_parented (an_item: like Falseitem) -- Assign True to parented for an_item. require key_combination_unique: an_item /= Void implies (Falseoccurrences (an_item) = 1 and not ../interface/ev_accelerator_list.xml#f_key_combination_existskey_combination_exists (an_item)) local accelerator_imp: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_accelerator_imp.xmlEV_ACCELERATOR_IMP do if an_item /= Void then accelerator_imp ?= an_item.../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_implementationimplementation check accelerator_imp /= Void then end accelerator_imp.../implementation_interface/ev_accelerator_i.xml#f_enable_parentedenable_parented end end
f_disable_item_parented../interface/ev_accelerator_list.xml#f_disable_item_parenteddisable_item_parented (an_item: like Falseitem) -- Assign False to parented for an_item. local accelerator_imp: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_accelerator_imp.xmlEV_ACCELERATOR_IMP do if an_item /= Void then accelerator_imp ?= an_item.../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_implementationimplementation check accelerator_imp /= Void then end accelerator_imp.../implementation_interface/ev_accelerator_i.xml#f_disable_parenteddisable_parented end end
feature {NONE} -- Contract support
f_key_combination_exists../interface/ev_accelerator_list.xml#f_key_combination_existskey_combination_exists (new_accelerator: like Falseitem): FalseBOOLEAN -- Does Current contain an accelerator with an identical key -- combination to new_accelerator? local old_cursor: FalseCURSOR do old_cursor := Falsecursor from Falsestart until Result or else Falseoff loop Result := Falseitem.../interface/ev_accelerator.xml#f_is_equalis_equal (new_accelerator) and then (Falseitem /= new_accelerator) Falseforth end Falsego_to (old_cursor) end

end -- class ../interface/ev_accelerator_list.xmlEV_ACCELERATOR_LIST
